titleStmt.title: The danger wherein the kingdome now standeth, & the remedie
titleStmt.author: Cotton, Robert, Sir, 1571-1631.

notesStmt.note: In this edition, A2r line 2 ends: selfe.
Central Library (Bristol, Eng.) copy identified as STC 5863 on UMI microfilm.
Reproductions of the originals in Central Library (Bristol, Eng.) and the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 1375 (Central Library (Bristol, Eng.)) copy and at reel 1658 (Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery copy).
